subject: Voice Mail
Sexual Harassment
lead_paragraph: Deadspin paid $12,000 for voice mails and photos that it said were sent by Brett Favre to Jenn Sterger, a former Jets game-day employee, said Nick Denton, the owner of Gawker Media.
snippet: Deadspin paid $12,000 for voice mails and photos that it said were sent by Brett Favre to Jenn Sterger, a former Jets game-day employee, said Nick Denton, the owner of Gawker Media.
